achievements_certifications.title: Topper of My Branch
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: I secured the highest academic rank in my branch with a CGPA of 8.96, maintaining excellent grades throughout my academic journey.

achievements_certifications.title: Top 5% in NPTEL IIT Gandhinagar - Getting Started with Competitive Programming
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: Ranked among the top 5% in a national-level competitive programming course conducted by IIT Gandhinagar, showcasing strong analytical thinking and coding skills.

achievements_certifications.title: Top 1% in NPTEL IIT Bombay Demystifying Networks Exam
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: Ranked among the top 1% in a national-level networking exam conducted by IIT Bombay, demonstrating strong technical and analytical skills.

achievements_certifications.title: Infosys Springboard Cohort 4 - Pragati Path to Future
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: Selected for Infosys Springboard Cohort 4 - Pragati Path to Future, a program focused on technical skill-building, career growth, and professional development.

achievements_certifications.title: Contributor - GirlScript Summer of Code (GSSoC'25)
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: Contributing to open-source projects as part of GSSoC'25, applying advanced DSA concepts while collaborating with teams on real-world development tasks.

achievements_certifications.title: GeeksforGeeks Coding Challenge Winner
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: Declared a winner of the GFG 160 Days Challenge for consistently solving problems, improving competitive programming and problem-solving skills.

leadershipActivities.title: Competitive Programming Student Coordinator
leadershipActivities.shortDescription: Selected as the Competitive Programming Coordinator to guide students in problem-solving, organize coding sessions, and promote a coding culture.

leadershipActivities.title: Campus Ambassador - GirlScript Summer of Code (GSSoC'25)
leadershipActivities.shortDescription: Represented the GSSoC'25 program on campus, contributing to the promotion of open-source development and encouraging student participation in coding events.

leadershipActivities.title: Lead - GeeksforGeeks Student Chapter (MITS)
leadershipActivities.shortDescription: Leading the GeeksforGeeks Student Chapter at MITS, collaborating with peers to organize coding challenges and mentor students in problem-solving.

leadershipActivities.title: Student Coordinator - Innovation & DIY Club
leadershipActivities.shortDescription: Guiding students in hands-on IoT projects at the Innovation & DIY Club, fostering technical skills and encouraging innovative thinking.
